# PassFields

**Object**

An object that represents the groups of fields that display information on the front and back of a pass.

## Declaration

```swift
object PassFields
```

## Adding content to the front of a pass

- **PassFields.PrimaryFields**: An object that represents the fields that display the most important information on the front of a pass.
- **PassFields.SecondaryFields**: An object that represents the fields that display supporting information on the front of a pass.
- **PassFields.AuxiliaryFields**: An object that represents the fields that display additional information on the front of a pass.
- **PassFields.HeaderFields**: An object that represents the fields that display information at the top of a pass.

## Adding content to the back of a pass

- **PassFields.BackFields**: An object that represents the fields that display information on the back of a pass.

## Adding content to the Additional Info section

- **PassFields.AdditionalInfoFields**: An object that represents fields that display in the Additional Info section below a pass.

## Adding content

- **PassFieldContent**: An object that represents the information to display in a field on a pass.

## Inherited By

- Pass.BoardingPass
- Pass.Coupon
- Pass.EventTicket
- Pass.Generic
- Pass.StoreCard
